El Señor Gumercindo hace mucho tiempo se dedica al servicio de transporte pesado, su esposa al comercio de papa a la vez son agricultores siembran productos agropecuarios en un terreno que les heredo su padre en la  comunidad Chullpani Chico, de esta forma ellos mantienen a sus hijos y brindándoles una buena educación ; don Gumercindo por el momento no está trabajando por que necesita dinero para comprar llantas nuevas para su camión, por este motivo vinieron a nuestra oficina de Cidre a solicitar un préstamo, don Gumercindo cuenta que  a veces el ahorro que tienen no les alcanza para los gastos de la casa;  en otros entidades financieras no lo quisieron otorgar el crédito por la edad.                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Por ultimo don Gumercindo y su esposa se sienten muy felices, compraran llantas y volverá a viajar lo más antes posible, además tienen un sueño que sus hijos salgan profesionales y que tengan un futuro mejor que ellos.
texts.en:
Gumercindo is 61 years old and has been married to Fructuosa for more than 35 years.  They have 3 dependent children who are in college, one of whom  is disabled and requires from his mother daily care.  The family lives in the Colomi zone at km 48 on the highway from Cochabamba to Santa Cruz.
He has been transporting heavy freight for some time now and his wife sells potatoes.  They are both farmers.  They raise agricultural products on land he inherited from his father in the community of Chullpani Chico.  In this way, they support their children and send them to get a good education.  Gumercindo at the moment is not working because he needs money to buy new tires for his truck.  This is why they have come to our offices of Cidre to ask for a loan.  He tells us that sometimes the savings that he has is not enough to support the household expenses.  Other financial institutions would not lend him money because of his age.
Finally Gumercindo and his wife feel happy.  They will buy the tires and they will begin to travel as soon as possible.  Their dream is to have their children be professionals and have a better future than what they have had.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.es: La señora Juanita es una  persona  responsable  y  muy trabajadora,  que  día  con día  se  preocupa  por  el  bienestar de su  familia, su mayor  sueño es  acondicionar  su  vivienda es  por ello  que   se acerco a la institución  para   que la apoyemos en culminar su proyecto, el cual  consiste   en   realizar  acabados  como  enjarre   y  pintura  en la  cocina  de   su  vivienda,  ve  en el  crédito la posibilidad  de    brindar  a  su  familia una  mayor  comodidad  además de  que  su   hogar  tendrá  una mejor  imagen.
texts.en: Sra. Juanita is a responsible, hard-working woman.  Her family's welfare is her foremost concern and she works day and night to provide for them.  Her immediate goal is to make improvements to the family kitchen and she is applying for a loan from this institution for that purspose.  She will use the loan to plaster and paint the kitchen.  She says that the loan will make her house more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to plaster and paint her kitchen.

loans.name: Mil Flores Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mil flores está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Ángela quien tiene una pequeña pulpería desde hace 5 años. Este negocio lo inicio con la venta de chiverías y dulces. Ella está casada y tiene tres hijos por los cuales trabaja arduamente.
Las otras integrantes son María Teresa quien tiene una fritanga, restaurante popular que consiste en comida frita y Carlos quien vende calzado.
texts.en:
The 'Mil Flores' group is made up of three hard-working and entrepreneurial people.  One of them is Ángela, who has owned a small grocery store for five years.  She started out in her business selling snacks and sweet treats.  She is married and has three children for whom she works hard.

The other members of the group are María Teresa, who has a 'fritanga' (a restaurant that serves fried food) and Carlos, who sells footwear.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, bread, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La Sra. Alicia tiene como actividad la elaboración de papas fritas y otras frituras las cuales distribuye en diferentes lugares de nuestra ciudad, esta  actividad la desarrolla día por medio a la semana, ella es una persona  muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de superarse en la vida.
Su familia esta compuesta por su esposo, quien también trabaja como maestro constructor en diferentes lugares por ahora el se encuentra trabajando en el interior a demás de sus pequeños niños,  el destino del crédito es para la compra de materiales de construcción para la conclusión de su vivienda con la compra materiales de construcción para así de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Alicia's business is making potato chips and other fried food which she distributes to different parts of our city.  She carries out this business every other day.  She is a very hard-working person who has a great desire to do well in life.

Alicia's family consists of her husband, who works as a master builder in different places and right now is working in the interior, and her young children.  Alicia will use this loan to buy building supplies so that she can finish building her home.  This will improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to finish building her home

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: El señor Eduardo es  una persona  responsable  y  muy trabajadora   que   día  con día   se  preocupa  por el  bienestar de su  familia, en esta  ocasión  requiere  de nuestra  ayuda  para  realizar  su proyecto  el cual  consiste   en   colocar  un portón en  su  domicilio  ya  que  nos comenta  que  en  ocasiones   han entrado  a  robar a su vivienda, es  por ello que  desea  proteger a   su  familia y  brindarles  una  excelente  estabilidad y  de esta  manera cuando  sale  a trabajar  lo hará  de una manera  mas  tranquila , agradece  el  apoyo  brindado  para la realización de su proyecto.
texts.en: Eduardo is a responsible and very hard-working person who always looks after his family's well-being.  On this occasion, he needs our help to carry out a project.  He would like to install a front door in his property as he tells us that people have occasionally entered his home to burgle it.  He would like to protect his family and provide them with good stability.  This means that when he goes out to work, he will do so more peacefully.  He is grateful for the support that he has been given to carry out his project.

loans.use: to install a front door

loans.name: Ann

texts.en: Ann is a businesswoman who sells necklaces and earrings to earn a living. She has been in the business for three years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Ann has been able to save her income, and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for a loan of 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more necklaces and earrings to sell.

loans.use: to buy necklaces and earrings for resale.

loans.name: Adare

texts.en: Adare lives in Yei where she has been selling food for two years. This 34-year-old married mother of four school-going children heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and is now requesting her first loan for 500 SDG to purchase cassava flour and maize for resale. Adare will use the extra income arising from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase cassava flour and maize to sell.

loans.name: Mgbomane Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 24 Mars 2001. Il  est  constitué de 14 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le commerce.
Madame Lucie Ndèye qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 65 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge 02 autre enfants qui sont ses petits enfants.
Elle s’active dans la vente de tissus. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on March 13, 2001. It comprises fourteen women who live in the same district. Their main business involves commerce. 

Ms. Lucie Ndèye, at the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the group's official. She is 65 years old, married, and the mother of eight children. She also supports two other children, who are her grandchildren. 

Ms. Lucie Ndèye is active in selling cloth. She has good experience in this business domain which she has been working at for several years. 

This loan will enable her to bolster her capital and to develop her business further. 

The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health care, food, clothing, etc....) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy cloth

loans.name: Geovana

texts.es: Geovana, de 36 años, es una mujer feliz. Vive en compañía de Casimiro, su esposo desde hace 15 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: John, Hilari y Steven que recién está en camino, le faltan 3 meses para llegar al mundo. En unión familiar viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Tambo. En su vientre lleva la mayor felicidad de una madre, un hijo. Tiene 7 meses de embarazo y se siente feliz, ya le puso el nombre a su tercer hijo. “Ahora debo trabajar el triple, para brindarle todo lo necesario a mis hijos”, menciona. La actividad al que se dedica es la recolección de materiales desechables como botellas de plásticos, materiales hechos a base de bronce, aluminio y cobre que ya no necesiten las personas. En su casa abrió una tienda de reciclaje donde las personas llevan las cosas que no necesitan para que Geovana les compre y así ella venda al por mayor a minoristas que llegan con sus camiones para trasportarlos a la ciudad de Lima, la capital del país. Pero como es muy ingeniosa también puso en su casa un disco venta, donde vende CD de cantantes y productos de belleza por catálogos, de esa manera obtiene un dinero extra. Además su esposo viaja a la semana a diversas ciudades del interior del país a comercializar ropa al por mayor.Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “mujeres solidarias” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde está feliz de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, para avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Geovana de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en el capital de trabajo para comprar más productos reciclables.
texts.en: Geovana, who is 36 years old, is a happy woman. She lives with Casimiro, her husband of 15 years. They have 3 sons, John, Hilari, and Steven, who is just on the way -- he needs three more months to arrive in the world. They live as a family unit in their own house, located in the town of Tambo. In her womb she carries the greatest happiness of a mother, a son. She is seven months pregnant and she feels happy; she has already named her third son. "Now I need to work three times as hard, to offer everything necessary to my sons," she mentions. Her business is collecting disposable materials such as plastic bottles and materials made of bronze, aluminum, and copper that people no longer need. In her house she opened a recycling shop where people bring the things that they don't need so that Geovana can buy them, and then she sells wholesale to the retailers who come with their trucks to transport them to the city of Lima, the capital of the country. But, as she is very resourceful, she set up a CD shop in her house where she sells CDs of singers and beauty products by catalog. In this way she obtains extra money. In addition, her husband travels weekly to various cities in the interior of the country to sell clothing wholesale. She belongs to the communal bank "Mujeres Solidarias" (united women) and this is her first loan with MFP, where she is happy to know that she will have financial support to advance with her business. On the other hand, she promises to make her loan payments. In addition, she is grateful to be part of her association (communal bank) because all the members are people who are responsible and united. Upon receiving her loan, Geovana will invest the money she has applied for in working capital to buy more recyclable products.

loans.use: to buy more recyclable products.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angélica de 46 años, convive con Daniel, con quien tiene 2 hijos de de 16 y 14. Ellos viven juntos en una casa propia en la comunidad de San Juan en el distrito de Huasahuasi, provincia de Tarma. Angélica trabaja arduamente en sus parcelas de terrenos. Es una mujer agricultora, que vio en el campo una oportunidad para salir adelante con su familia. Desde sus 18 años labra la tierra cultivando principalmente papas en distintas variedades.
Cuenta con 3 lotes o parcelas de terrenos agrícolas, los que producen 2 veces al año si se trata de arvejas, y una vez al año si son papas. “La papa que más siembro es la Perricholi. En cada cosecha obtengo 25 sacos, por parcela, pero varias veces he sembrado en las 3 al mismo tiempo”, comenta. Angélica está contenta con sus resultados por que todo lo que obtiene es a a base de esfuerzo y dedicación. Ahora piensa adquirir un pequeño automóvil, que no será nuevo, pero le servirá de mucho para movilizarse. Éste sería su préstamo número 5 que recibiría de MFP, gracias a su ayuda. Se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y está satisfecha con sus logros. Invertirá el dinero en la compra de bolsas de fertilizantes orgánicos para sus cultivos de papas, que piensa cosechar en mayo.
texts.en:
Angelica, 46 years old, lives with Daniel, with whom she has 2 children, ages 16 and 14. They reside together in their own house in the community of San Juan, district of Huasahuasi, province of Tarma. Angelica works arduously in her parcels of land. She is a farming woman who sees in the countryside an opportunity to get ahead with her family. Since the age of 18, she has labored, cultivating land, principally with potatoes of distinct varieties.

Angelica has 3 lots, or parcels, of agricultural land which produce green peas 2 times a year and potatoes once a year. “The potato sown most often is Perricholi. At each harvest I get 25 sacks per parcel, but at various times I have sown all 3 (parcels) at the same time,” she commented. Angelica is content with her results because everything she obtains results from her efforts and dedication. Now she wants to acquire a small used automobile that will serve to make her more mobile.

This will be her 5th loan received through MFP, thanks to its help. She promises to be punctual in making her monthly payments. Angelica belongs to the “Siempre Juntos” (Always Together) communal bank and she is satisfied with her achievements. She will invest the loan in sacks of organic fertilizer for her potato crops which she plans to harvest in May.

loans.use: buy organic fertilizer for her potato crops.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor de 23 años que, convive con el padre de sus 2 hijas de 4 años y una bebé de 1 mes de nacida; a las que cuida y educa en casa de sus padres; ubicada en la zona rural de Santa Clara, en el distrito de Huasahuasi. Flor está muy contenta, hace 1 mes nació su bebé pero con la fuerza que la caracteriza ya labora en el campo. Ya tiene 4 años dedicándose a la agricultura. Sus principales sembríos constan de papa, que su principal actividad. Las diferentes variedades de la misma, le permite vender su producción todo el año, sin mayores dificultades. Además se encarga de cuidar a sus 3 vacas de raza, las que el brindan leche para elaborar quesos, los que vende  en la ciudad de Huasahuasi y Tarma y algunos en su propia localidad. Por ahora no tiene mayores preocupaciones; pero cuando sus pequeñas hijas crezcan tendrá que invertir en su buena educación Por ello está  ahorrando todo el dinero necesario para poder lograr sus objetivos. Una de sus metas es construir su casa propia y vivir independientemente, así le estaría dando una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Trabaja y trabajará para eso. Este sería su crédito número 7 con MFP, por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Trabajemos unidos”, y haciendo honor al nombre sus integrantes son muy colaboradores. Flor invertirá el dinero del préstamo en la compra de bolsas de abonos orgánicos cuyo precio es de 120 soles cada uno; y guano de corral que cuesta 12 soles el saco. Todo esto para sus sembríos de papas.
texts.en:
23-year-old Flor lives with the father of her two daughters.  She has a 4 year old and a one-month-old baby who she cares for and educates in her parents' home, in the rural part of Santa Clara, in Huasahuasi district.  Flor is very happy because her baby was born a month ago.  However, with her characteristic strength, she is already back working in the fields.  She has been farming four years, her main crops being potatoes.  She grows different varieties of potatoes and this allows her to sell her crops all year round without major difficulties.  In addition, she also cares for her three thoroughbred cows which provide her with milk, from which she makes cheese.  She sells her cheese in the cities of Huasahuasi and Tarma, and also sells some in her own town.  Right now, she doesn't have any major worries but as her young daughters grow she will have to invest in a good education for them.  For this reason, she is saving up all the money she needs to achieve her goals.  One of her goals is to build her own home and live independently.  This would provide her family with a better quality of life.  She is working and will continue working to achieve this.

This will be Flor's seventh loan from MFP and she pledges to make her monthly repayments on time.  She belongs to the "Trabajemos Unidos" (Let's Work Together) community bank and, in keeping with the group's name, the members are very cooperative.  Flor will invest her loan money in buying sacks of organic fertilizer for 120 soles each.  She will also buy guano from farmyard birds which costs 12 soles a sack.  This will all be used on her potatoes.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Rolin

texts.es:
Rolin, de 21 años, convive con la madre de su hijo Jean Pier, de 2 años, al que cuidan con mucho amor en una casa arrendada, ubicada en la localidad de Santa Clara, distrito de Huasahuasi. Rolin es un joven responsable y trabajador.  Hace 4 años que se dedica a sembrar sus propios terrenos agrícolas, que heredó de parte de sus padres; pero es de corto tamaño, por ello trabaja en otros terrenos arrendados. Su principal  siembra, consta de distintas variedades de papa, los que después de cada cosecha los comercializa en el mercado central de su localidad. Pero como las fuerzas que tiene son muchas; cuenta que en sus tiempos libres trabaja en otros sembríos, con las ganancias que obtiene ahorra lo máximo. Con ello planea comprar sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Ahora tiene poca responsabilizada por ello espera obtener todo el capital necesario para poder lograr sus objetivos. Espera ahorrar lo suficiente para construir su propia casa y darle las comodidades a su familia. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Trabajemos unidos”, y este sería su tercer crédito con MFP, se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales como lo fue anteriormente. Le gusta trabajar con su banco comunal por que sus miembros son personas responsables y cumplidas.
Rolin, invertirá el dinero en la compra de 10 sacos de abonos orgánicos para esparcirlos en sus cultivos de papas que hace poco sembró.
texts.en:
Rolin, age 21, lives with the mother of his 2-year-old son Jean Pier, whom he cares for with great love, in a rented house. The house is located in the town of Santa Clara, in the district of Huasahuasi. Rolin is a responsible and hard-working young man. For the past four years, he has dedicated himself to planting his own agricultural lands, which he inherited from his parents. However, his plot of land is small, and for this reason he also works on other rented lands. His main crop consists of different varieties of potatoes, which he sells at the central market in his town after each harvest. But since he has a lot of energy, he reports that in his free time he works on other farms, and from his earnings he saves the maximum amount. With these savings, he plans to buy his own agricultural lands. Now he has little under his responsibility, so he hopes to obtain all the necessary capital so that he can achieve his goals. He hopes to save enough so he can build his own house and give his family comfortable living conditions. He belongs to the “Trabajemos unidos” ["Let's Work in Unity"] communal bank, and this will be his third loan with MFP. He is committed to being punctual with his monthly payments, as he was in the past. He likes working with his communal bank because its members are responsible and dependable people. 

Rolin will invest the loan funds in buying 10 sacks of organic fertilizer to spread on his potato fields which he recently planted.

loans.use: to buy 10 sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
Fredy de 27 años, es soltero. Vive con su madre de 48 años y de su padre de 50 años, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Santa clara en el distrito de Huasahuasi. Fredy es un hijo ejemplar, dedica su juventud a cuidar a sus padres y trabajar con ellos. Fredy cuenta que a pesar de las diversas dificultades que encontró en la actividad agrícola, le gusta mucho el campo.  La siembra de papa, es su principal actividad. Su principal problema es el clima, que a veces lo azota con intensas lluvias y frío intenso, pero a pesar de eso, él trabaja con el mismo esfuerzo. Hace 10 años se dedica al campo, tiempo suficiente para conocer las temporadas de sembrío y para coincidirlos con la época de mayor venta, en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, por ello le molesta mucho, cuando insisten en bajar los precios. Para más adelante adquirirá sus propios terrenos agrícolas, para ahorrarse en pagos y contar con una estabilidad. Su trabajo es arduo y más aún, siendo el que más ingresos económicos aporta en la familia. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Trabajemos unidos”, y este sería su crédito número 12 de MFP, y se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. Se siente contento de poder ahorrar con su banco comunal. 
Fredy, invertirá el dinero del préstamo en la compra de bolsas de abonos orgánicos para fertilizar sus cultivos de papas.
texts.en:
27-year-old Fredy is single.  He lives with his 48-year-old mother and his 50-year-old father in their own home, in the town of Santa Clara, in Huasahuasi district.  Fredy is an exemplary son.  He devotes his youth to caring for his parents and working with them.  He says that, in spite of the various difficulties that he has experienced in farming, he really enjoys it.  His main business activity is growing potatoes.  His main problem is the weather which sometimes batters him with intense rain and cold.  However, in spite of this, he works with the same effort.  Fredy has been farming for 10 years, enough time to get to know the sowing seasons and make sure they coincide with the best time of year for making sales in the wholesale market in the city of Tarma.  It really bothers him when buyers insist on lowering prices.  In the future, Fredy will acquire his own farmland which will save him money and provide him with stability.  His work is hard but, even so, he is the one who makes most income in his family.

Fredy belongs to the "Trabajemos Unidos" (Let's Work Together) community bank and this will be his 12th loan from MFP.  He pledges to be punctual in making his loan repayments.  He feels happy that he is able to save with his community bank.  Fredy will invest his loan money in buying sacks of organic fertilizer with which to fertilize his potatoes.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa tiene 53 años. Es una mujer entusiasta, está casada con Raymundo con quien tiene 6 hijos. Pero solo vive con 3 de ellos de 30, 20 y 16 años. Su casa es propia ubicada en la zona rural de Santa Clara, en el distrito de Huasahuasi. Teresa se dedica la agricultura, desde hace 25 años que comenzó con el cultivo de papa en sus 6 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, sembrando en grandes cantidades en las variedades “Primereza”, “Yungay”, “Única” , los cuales realiza gracias al apoyo de su esposo e hijos. Asimismo cuenta que tiene 5 toros con los que ara la tierra, y los que alquila a otros agricultores para el mismo fin. Además de tener 13 vacas lecheras que le proporcionan un buen queso que vende los días domingos en la feria que se realiza en a ciudad de Tarma. Por cada molde de queso gana de 3 a 4 soles. Cuenta que desde niña comenzó a trabajar muy duro por lo que pudo sacar adelante a sus hijos. De esa manera sus 2 hijos menores están estudiando en la ciudad de Tarma, para ello, alquiló una casa donde viven con tranquilidad y a donde Teresa se dirige para visitarlos. Este sería se crédito número 12 con MFP, que obtendría gracias a su ayuda, se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Trabajemos unidos”, y se siente contenta de pertenecerlo por el trabajo solidario. Teresa, comprará bolsas de abonos orgánicos para esparcirlos en sus cultivos de papas. Invertirá todo su dinero en esa actividad.
texts.en:
53-year-old Teresa is an enthusiastic woman.  She is married to Raymundo and the couple have six children.  They only live with three of their children who are 30, 20 and 16 years old.  Their home is located in the rural part of Santa Clara, in Husasahuasi district.

Teresa's business is farming.  She started out in this line of work 25 years ago, growing potatoes on her 6 hectares of farmland.  She sows large quantities of 'Primereza', 'Yungay' and 'Única' potatoes thanks to the support of her husband and children.  She says that she also has 5 bulls that she uses to plow the soil and which she hires out to other farmers for the same purpose.  In addition, she has 13 dairy cows which provide her with good cheese that she sells on Sundays in the market in Tarma.  She makes 3 to 4 soles for each whole cheese.  She tells us that she started working very hard when she was very young in order to provide for her children.  Her two youngest children are studying in the city of Tarma.  For this reason, she rented a house where they live peacefully and she heads over there to visit them.

This will be Teresa's 12th loan from MFP which she will receive thanks to your help.  She pledges to be punctual in making her monthly repayments.  Teresa belongs to the "Trabajemos Unidos" (Let's Work Together) community bank and she feels happy to belong to the group because of their supportive work.  She will buy sacks of organic fertilizer to spread over her potato crops and invest all her money in this.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Las Poderosas Group

texts.es: Banco de emprendimiento Las Poderosas se encuentra  en su primer ciclo conformado por 8 integrantes de los cuales 6 son mujeres y 2 varones viven la localidad de Quebrada Seca, todos cuentan con una actividad, como la venta de comida, cotillón, servicio, draga, cerámica, cuneta con una mesa directiva donde .                                                                                                                    La señorita Sandra actualmente toma el cargo de presidenta del banco se dedica a la fabricación y venta  de cotillones para todos los acontecimientos sociales, se dedica a esta actividad hace un año, vive en quebrada seca hace 22 años, vive en casa de su tío. El préstamo será destinado para la compra de materiales como papel y cartulina, cuero para la fabricación de materiales y así  aumentar su capital de trabajo  es soltera esta es la única actividad con la que mantiene a su familia que esta compuesta por su mama y hermanos. Todos los socios Están muy agradecidos con nuestra entidad por haber confiado en ellos y brindarles un apoyo para poder crecer en sus negocios y actividades.
texts.en:
The Las Poderosas community bank is starting its first round of funding with 8 members: 6 women and 2 men.  All of the members live in Quebrada Seca.  The members operate various businesses selling products such as prepared foods and "cotillones" (party masks, streamers and other paraphanelia for parties).  
Srta. Sandra, the president of the group, makes and sells cotillones.  Sandra, 22, lives in Quebrada Seca and has operated the business for a year.  She will use the loan to buy the materials she needs--paper and cardboard, for example--to make the products she sells.  Sandra is single and the income from her business helps to support her mother, brothers and sisters.  
The members of the group say that they are grateful for your trust and support because your loans make it possible for them to continue their businesses.

loans.use: to buy supplies for their crafts businesses.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: El Sr. FELIX  tiene 37 años no es casado pero tiene su pareja  no tiene hijos su actividad es la de Agricultor su parcela  se encuentran en la localidad de SURUTU. Esta en novena secuencia de su préstamo, El Sr. Félix  usara este préstamo para la siembra de Poroto y cosecha de maíz. Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es crecer en su actividad, El Sr. Félix enfrenta retos en su negocio que son salir de la pobreza,  va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de mas semillas e incrementar su producción para la venta directa de sus productos del productor al consumidor, se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Félix is 37 years old.  He is not married but does have a partner.  He does not have any children.  Félix's business is farming.  He has a plot of land in the town of Surutu.  This is his ninth loan.

Félix will use this loan to sow beans and harvest his corn.  He is requesting this loan so that he can grow in his business.  Félix faces challenges in his business.  One of these challenges is climbing out of poverty.  He will use his profits to buy more seeds and increase his production so that he can sell his products directly from producer to consumer.  He feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support they have provided.

loans.use: to sow beans and to cover the expenses he incurs harvesting his corn

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas is 51 years old and is married to Loice. They have five children that are currently attending school.

For the last 11 years, Thomas has been operating a bicycle repair business in Oloitoktok town.

He was introduced to KADET LTD by a friend who is also a KADET client. This would be his first loan via KADET. He intends to use the loan proceeds to buy spare parts for repairing bicycles. In future, Thomas hopes to grow and expand his business and also to venture into farming.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for bicycle repairs.

loans.name: Abu's Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are secdonary school teachers in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone. This group of teachers have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan in order to meet their immedidate financial challenges. At the end of each month, they repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for making the repayments on their behalf.

Abu is the leader of this group of teachers, and he notes that he has been a professional teacher for 22 years. Abu is a 38-year-old native of Yonibana village. He is married to a trader, and he and his wife have four children. Two of their children are in primary school, one is in secondary school, and the other is not yet old enough for school. He has requested his portion of this loan in order to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Wesley

texts.en:
Wesley, a 34-year-old man from Kilgoris, is married to Jackline and they have two children aged seven and three years old. Wesley has been operating a motorcycle transport business for the last year, earning a monthly income of KES.10,000. Now requesting his first loan from KADET LTD to buy spare parts, he will buy a new motorbike in the future.

Wesley's dream is to grow his business and provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motor bike

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
Karina de 26 años es una madre soltera. Gabriela de 3 años, es su única hija. Karina vive con su padres, en la casa de ellos, ubicada en el distrito de Tarma. Karina es una chica jovial y carismática. Se dedica a varias actividades, principalmente a la cría de gallinas y cuyes. Al mes vende de 15 a 20 cuyes en la ciudad de Lima, ya que la carne de este roedor es muy solicitada por la ciudad capital. De la misma manera negocia con las gallinas, pero estas las vende en la misma ciudad de Tarma.
En su casa, tiene instalado varios corrales donde alimenta a sus animales.
Mientras tanto, durante el día, Karina trabaja en una pastelería, vendiendo queques y tortas. Ahí recibe un sueldo mensual que le permite solventar sus gastos diarios.
Una de sus preocupaciones fue, desenvolverse como madre soltera, pero ya son 3 años que trabaja sola y bien. Se siente contenta con su desempeño y confía que así podrá brindarle a su pequeña hija el amor y apoyo necesarios.
Más adelante piensa ampliar sus corrales y criar más cuyes y gallinas, por que asegura que el negocio es rentable. Éste sería su crédito número 13 que obtendrá de MFP, por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Pertenece al banco comunal “GS-006” y se siente contenta de trabajar con mujeres luchadoras como ella.
De recibir el dinero podrá invertir en la compra de más jaulas para criar gallinas, y otros cuyes grandes para reproducirlos y venderlos.
texts.en:
Karina, aged 26, is a single mother.  Gabriela, aged 3, is her only daughter.  Karina lives with her parents in their home, which is located in the district of Tarma.

Karina is a cheerful and charismatic girl.  She works doing various things, mainly raising chickens and guinea-pigs.  She sells 15 to 20 guinea-pigs a month in the city of Lima, as this rodent's meat is very much in demand in the capital city.  She does business in the same way with chickens, but these she sells in the city of Tarma.  She has installed several pens at her home where she feeds her animals.

Meanwhile, during the day Karina works at a bakery, selling cakes and tarts.  Here she receives a monthly salary which allows her to cover her daily expenses.

One of her preoccupations has been to survive as a single mother, but it's now been three years that she has been working on her own and it's been going well.  She feels happy with her performance, and trusts that in this way she will be able to provide her young daughter with love and necessary support.

Down the line, she hopes to expand her pens and raise more guinea-pigs and chickens, as this will ensure that her business is profitable.  This will be her 13th loan obtained through MFP, and she agrees to be punctual in making her monthly repayments.  She belongs to the “GS-006” communal bank, and is happy to be working with striving women like herself.

On receiving the money, she will be able to invest in the purchase of more cages for raising chickens, and some more grown guinea-pigs for breeding and selling.

loans.use: to purchase guinea-pigs and cages.

loans.name: Medardo

texts.es:
Medardo de 41 años, convive con Teodosia con quien tiene 2 hijos: Noemí de 20 y Ángel de 16 años. Ellos viven en una casa propia en el anexo Patay, distrito de Palca. Medardo es un hombre fuerte y constante, con esas características se dedica a la agricultura y le va muy bien en la negociación de sus productos.
Él siembra arvejas 2 veces al año, ya que la variedad de arvejas que produce se cosecha cada 6 meses. Así también afirma que es más rentable la venta de flores de gladiolos.
Ahora tiene sembrado 2 parcelas de flores, las que ya estarán listas para el mes de abril. “Cada vez siembro 30 sacos de semillas de flores blancas y rojas, que son las más solicitadas”, menciona.
El mes donde los precios favorecen a Medardo son noviembre y mayo, cada paquete de 12 docenas de flores está a 80 soles. Los meses restantes el precio baja hasta los 60 soles, aún así Medardo obtiene buenos ingresos. 
De esta manera, quiere obtener más terrenos agrícolas para ampliar su producción de arvejas y gladiolos. Este sería su crédito número 7 que recibiría gracias a su ayuda de MFP, por eso se compromete  a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Picaflores de Patay”, se siente contento de formar parte de un grupo sólido y empeñoso. Con el dinero del préstamo comprará 15 bolsas de abonos orgánicos para esparcirlos en sus cultivos de gladiolos.
texts.en:
Medardo, 41 years old and lives with Teodosia, with whom he has 2 children, Noemi, age 20, and Angel, age 16. They reside in their own house in the annex of Patay in Palca district. Medardo is a strong and constant man. With these same characteristics he pursues agriculture and he has been doing well in selling his production.

Medardo sows green peas twice a year -- the variety he produces can be harvested every 6 months. But he reports that it is more profitable to sell gladiola flowers. Now he has 2 parcels planted in flowers that will be ready in April. “Each time, I sow 30 sacks of white and red flower seeds, which are the most in demand,” he notes. November and May are the months with the best prices. Each packet of 12 dozen flowers brings in 80 sols. The remaining months the price falls to 60 sols. And even at this price, Medardo obtains a good income.

In this manner, he wishes to obtain more agricultural land to expand his production of peas and gladiolas. This will be his 7th loan, thanks to the help of MFP, and he promises to be punctual in making his monthly payments. Medardo belongs to the “Los Picaflores de Patay” (The Hummingbirds of Patay) communal bank. He is content to be part of such a solid enterprising group. With this loan, he will purchase 15 sacks of organic fertilizer to spread on his gladiola fields.

loans.use: buy 15 sacks of organic fertilizer for use on his gladiola fields.

loans.name: Silva

texts.es: La señora Silvia es  una  persona  trabajadora   y  muy  responsable  la  cual se  preocupa  por  salir adelante  día  con día, actualmente   ella  cuenta  con una  tienda  de  abarrotes la  cual  atiende   con  mucha  dedicación , es  por ella  que  en esta  ocasión  ella  necesita   realizar  la compra  de mercancía  para  su  negocio,  ve  en el  crédito la  posibilidad  de  hacerlo crecer   generando  mayores  ingresos  y   sobre todo ofrecer  a  su   familia  una mejor estabilidad  económica,  agrádese   en  apoyo  brindado para la  realización de  su proyecto.
texts.en:
Silvia is a hardworking and very responsible person who is concerned about getting ahead day by day. Right now she has a grocery store which she attends to with care. It is the reason she needs to buy merchandise for her business.  

She sees the possibility of making the loan grow, making more income and above all offering her family more economic stability. She is grateful for the help given to her for the realization of her project.

loans.use: buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Binta

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 45-year-old Binta from Krootown Central area in Freetown. She is married with two children who are 6 and 24 years old. Both of Binta children's are currently attending school.

Binta runs a general merchandise shop at a main road in town, where she sells various items, including crate drinks, rubber buckets, used clothes, pots, baby food, and plastic containers for water. She has been running this business for 10 years. She explains that she works at the business from 8 am until 6 pm, 7 days per week. Her other source of income comes from selling palm oil and gari (a staple food in her region). Binta says that her main business challenge is the fact that she lacks capital to invest in and expand her business.

Binta has requested a loan in order to buy more goods, such as crate drinks, rubber buckets, used clothes, pots, and baby food. With the additional profits she expects to generate as a result of the loan, she will be able to improve her family's standard of living and living conditions. In the future, she plans to open a bigger shop in town. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory (e.g., crate drinks, rubber buckets, used clothes, pots, and baby food)

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet a 41-year-old woman living in South Sudan. She is married, and she and her husband have four children. All of their children are currently in school.

To earn a living, she sells charcoal. She explains that she has been in this line of business for five years.

Janet heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This would be her second loan from BRAC. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 700 SDG in order to purchase more charcoal. She will use any extra income generated as a result of this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase additional charcoal for re-sale purposes.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: acheter 12 moutons

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga es una mujer muy emprendedora made familia, sus 4 hijos son independientes económicamente, tiene 50 años de edad y vive en un caserío rural perteneciente al distrito de Morrope y el mismo a la provincia de Chiclayo, su caserío es pequeño con muy pocos habitantes los cuales se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería exclusivamente. 

Olga cuenta con casa propia en la que ha instalado una pequeña bodega y vende en su mayoría lo que son productos de primera necesidad, adicionalmente también se genera otros ingresos dedicándose al servicio de costura, pues ya los moradores de la zona la conocen por su buen trabajo y apoyo que les brinda cuando la necesitan, ah dicha actividad se dedica ya un aproximado de 7años pues es soltera y tiene que hacer realidad su proyecto de salir adelante y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.


Olga aun desea seguir invirtiendo en sus negocios por lo que solicita un crédito a edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1500 Nuevos Soles para la compra de abarrotes con los que pueda surtir más su bodega y así fidelizar más a sus clientes.
Es muy conocida, solicitada y considerada en el caserío en el que vive precisamente por el tipo de trabajo que tiene.
texts.en:
Olga, 50, is an enterprising woman.  She has 4 children, all independent now, and lives in a tiny, rural town in Morrope, a district in Chiclayo province.  The town where she lives is very small, with only a few people, most of whom make a living from farming and raising livestock.  

Olga operates a small grocery from her house, selling the kinds of everyday products that local people need from day to day.  She earns extra money with a sewing business and she is known in the neighborhood for the quality of her work.  Her neighbors know, too, that they can count on her in a pinch.  She has operated the business for 7 years.  She started it because she was single and needed an income. 

Olga is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new soles loan that she will use to stock her grocery.

loans.use: to stock her corner grocery.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora María, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, en la comunidad el Edén, junto a su familia, los planes futuros hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de habita, ya que no llega el agua potable hasta la humilde parcela, lo que tiene que estar  con un carretón jalando diariamente el agua de un pozo cercano, la mayor dificultad que se le presento durante el  ciclo de la piña fue la producción que no se completo , quedando la fruta muy pequeña y sin sabor  ,  ella agradece el apoyo que le brinda Kiva , para poder seguirle dando el mantenimiento adecuado al cultivo de piña  , esperando que este año sea mejor tanto para los siembro y el beneficio de la su familia ya que este el gran potencial económico para poder subsistir  . Con el préstamo otorgado va a comprar fertilizantes s insumos .
texts.en: María lives in El Eden community, in the town of Ticuantepe, together with her family.  Her future plans for her family are to improve their living conditions because piped drinking water does not reach their humble plot of land which means she has to pull a cart every day to fetch water from a nearby well.  The biggest difficulty she has faced during the growth cycle of her pineapples was when one of her harvests did not complete and the fruit turned out very small and flavorless.  She is grateful for the support she receives from Kiva which enables her to continue providing her pineapple crop with suitable maintenance.  She hopes that this year will be better for her crops and for her family as this is the main financial source of income with which they support themselves.  María will use the loan she has been given to buy fertilizers and agricultural supplies.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and agricultural supplies

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 37-year-old, married man. He and his wife have one child.

To earn a living, he runs a butcher shop. He explains that he has been in this line of business for 6 years and that he employs one person.

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his family's standard of living. In the future, he hopes to expand his business. He has applied for a loan in the amount of 20,000 KES to buy a cow for slaughter.

loans.use: To purchase a cow for slaughter

loans.name: Madai

texts.es:
La señora Madai tiene tres hijos, ella trabaja en una fábrica y su esposo es guardia de seguridad, es un matrimonio muy responsable y cumplidor. Están solicitando un préstamo para poder comprar la lamina que necesita para cambiar el techo de su vivienda, pues ya esta en muy malas condiciones, y desean mejorar su patrimonio para su familia y protegerlos de enfermedades.
Mejorar la calidad de vida y bienestar de su familia y darles un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Ms. Madai has three children and works in a factory. Her husband is a security guard. The couple is very responsible and good about following through on their commitments. They are seeking a loan in order to be able to buy corrugated laminate made of asbestos and cement, needed for switching out the roof on their living quarters. Currently the roof is in very bad condition and so they wish to improve their property for their family's sake, and protect them from illnesses. 

Their dream is to improve their family's quality of life and wellbeing, and give them a better future.

loans.use: to purchase corrugated laminate made of asbestos and cement for the roof of her house.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es: La señora  Rosalba  es una persona muy responsable  la  cual se acerco a la institución  ya   que  desea  utilizar  su crédito  para   colocar   la  losa  de  concreto  en  uno  de  los cuartos  que  esta  construyendo,  ve  en el crédito la posibilidad  de  brindar  a su   familia  una excelente   comodidad  y   concluir   con su  proyecto  ya  que  debido a  que  no  contaba  con el  capital disponible no había  continuado con la  construccion,  agradece  el  apoyo   brindado para  la realización de  su proyecto.
texts.en:
Ms. Rosalba is a very responsible person who approached the institution because she wishes to use her loan for installing concrete flagstone in one of the rooms she is building. She sees in the loan the possibility of providing her family with excellent comfort, and of finishing her project, since she had not kept up with the construction due to lack of available capital. 

She appreciates the support offered for the completion of her project.

loans.use: to purchase concrete flagstone.

loans.name: Anita Maribel

texts.es:
Anita es una mujer de 32 años, se considera una persona alegre, tranquila y paciente, pero le gusta ser responsable y que las cosas le salgan bien. Anita es madre soltera, vive con sus dos hijos en Machachi que se encuentra a 45 minutos de Latacunga.

Anita trabaja en un puesto de comidas, exactamente vende fritada que es carne de cerdo frita, vende con choclos, platanos y tostado (maíz frito). Es el segundo crédito que realiza a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de cerdos para incrementar su producción de fritada, debido a que día a día por su carisma su clientela va incrementando y quiere servirles mejor. Esta inversión ayudará a Anita a que sus clientes se sientan satisfechos y en su familia brindarles el sustento de cada día y darles el estudio a sus hijos.

Anita sueña con construir un local grande y propio para atender mejor a su cliente.
texts.en:
Anita is a 32-year-old woman.  She considers herself to be a cheerful, calm and patient person.  She likes to be responsible and likes things to turn out well.  She is a single mother and lives with her two children in Machachi, 45 minutes from Latacunga.

Anita works on a food stall.  She sells 'fritada' (fried pork) together with corn cobs, plantains and 'tostado' (fried corn).  This is her second loan from Fodemi and she will invest it in buying pigs so that she can increase her production of 'fritada' because, owing to her charm, her number of customers is increasing every day and she would like to serve them better.  This investment will help Anita to keep her customers satisfied.  She will be able to provide her family with their daily sustenance and provide her children with an education.

Anita dreams of building bigger premises of her own so that she can better serve her customers.

loans.use: to buy pigs to increase her food production because she has more customers every day

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and supplies for sugar cane farming.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase soft and hard drinks and bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To get working capital for her used clothing business.

loans.name: Perla Esmeralda

texts.es:
La señora Perla y su esposo trabajan en una fabrica, es una matrimonio joven que tiene un hijo, acaban de adquirir su vivienda y están pagando actualmente por lo que, están solicitando un préstamo ya que necesitan realizarle mejorar que es la elaboración de la barda alrededor de su vivienda, para mejorar la seguridad y privacidad de su familia y poder brindarles una mejor protección. 
Necesitan el crédito para comprar el material que es block, varilla, cemento, arena y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejorar.
texts.en:
Perla and her husband work in a factory.  They are a young couple and have one child.  They have just acquired their own home and are currently paying for it.  They are requesting a loan as they need to make an improvement.  They need to build a perimeter wall around their home to improve their family's safety and privacy and to provide them with better protection.

Perla and her husband need this loan to buy materials (blocks, rods, cement and sand) and to pay the person who will carry out the work.

loans.use: to build a perimeter wall around her home

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: Maria Cristina tiene 64 años de edad, la actividad a la que se dedica es a la venta de mercadería en general está actividad la realiza de forma ambulante en el cual ya tiene varios clientes fijos y eventuales a quienes le ofrece su producto. Maria Cristina, ya tiene varios años de experiencia por esa razón sus clientes la buscan para comprar su producto. Esta emprendedora está solicitando financiamiento para comprar mercadería como pantalones, camisa, blusa, short, variedad de cosméticos, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Maria Cristina is 64. She is a street vendor, and sells general merchandise. She has several steady customers, as well as casual ones, to  whom she sells her products. 

Maria Cristina already has several years experience, and for that reason her clients seek her out in order to buy her goods. This entrepreneur is applying for a loan to buy merchandise such as pants, shirts, blouses, shorts, a variety of cosmetics, and other goods.

loans.use: To buy pants, shirts, blouses, shorts, a variety of cosmetics, and other goods.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: El señor  Ernesto es  una persona  muy  responsable, actualmente   el cuenta con un negocio de  venta  de  comida  el cual  junto  con su  esposa  han sacado  adelante  día  con día,  en  esta  ocasión se  acerco a  la institución  ya  que  desea   realizar  la compra  de   materia  prima  para  seguir    trabajando, agradece  el  apoyo   brindado para  la realización de su proyecto   ya  que   ve  en  el crédito la posibilidad  de  seguir  ofreciendo  a sus  clientes  el excelente  sazón y servicio  que  la  a caracterizado y  esto  le  permitirá generar  mayores   ingresos.
texts.en: Ernesto is a very responsible person.  He currently has a food business which he and his wife make progress in every day.  On this occasion, they approached the institution as they would like to buy supplies so that they can continue working.  He is grateful for the support that he is being given which will enable him to carry out his work.  He sees the loan as giving him the possibility to continue offering his customers the excellent flavor and service that he is noted for.  This will allow him to make more income.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his restaurant

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: Alberto, tiene la edad de 51 años, es casado y tiene un hijo, que es su mayor prioridad vive con su esposa y su hijo. El quiere comprar abono e insumos  para asistir su Cafetal que es su fuente de ingresos.  Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer. También tiene arboles frutales en su casa. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. También, el  ha realizado otros préstamos en Una Cooperativa (COOPEAGRI )  Pero  FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El también tiene el deseo de brindarle a su HIjo la educación necesaria  para que sea en el futuro una persona preparada y pueda enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida.
texts.en:
Alberto is 51 years old, married, and has one child who is his greatest priority.  Alberto lives with his wife and child.  He would like to buy fertilizer and supplies for his coffee plantation which is his source of income.  He has been running his farm for some years and would like to grow his business.  He also has fruit trees at home.  

This is Alberto's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He has taken out previous loans from a cooperative (COOPEAGRI) but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.  Alberto would like to provide his child with the education he needs to become an educated person who can face life more easily.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and supplies for growing coffee

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: El señor  Alberto es una persona  responsable  y  muy  trabajadora  , la cual  actualmente   tiene  una estética, esta le a  permitido  salir  adelante  día  con día ,  el se acerco a  la  institución ya  que  requiere  realizar  la compra  de  materia  prima para continuar realizando los  diferentes  trabajos  que  le  solicitan, ve en el crédito  la posibilidad de  seguir   brindado  a sus clientes  el  excelente  servicio   que  lo  a caracterizado ,  además  le  permitirá   generar  mayores  ingresos  por lo que  se   encuentra  muy  contento.
texts.en:
Alberto is a responsible and very hard-working person. Currently, he has a beauty salon that has allowed him to keep going day by day. 

He approached the institution, as he needs to purchase supplies in order to continue doing the various services that people ask for. 

In the loan, he sees the chance to continue offering his customers the excellent service that he has been known for. In addition, it will allow him to generate greater income, which he is very happy about.

loans.use: To buy supplies for his beauty salon.

loans.name: Mayra Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora  Mayra del Socorro es  casada y tiene 39 años de edad,  reside en  Nindirí municipio de Masaya, comenta que comenzó su negocio con un capital propio, pero debido a la demanda que le ha ido creciendo, ha buscado apoyo por medio de financiamiento, el cual dice que le han servido de mucha ayuda porque de esa manera ha aumentado su pulpería  esto por mas de 5 años. 

La señora Mayra manifiesta que tiene una alta rotación de los productos de la pulpería y hoy en día que se le han ido agotando requiere abastecer el negocio ya que de esta manera logrará satisfacer la demanda de sus fieles clientes. Por este motivo solicita en Ceprodel el crédito para la compra de pollo, cerdo, arroz, azúcar, condimentos, gaseosas, frijol, sardinas, sopas maggi.
texts.en:
Mayra del Socorro is 39 years old, married, and lives in Nindirí, in Masaya.  She says that she started her business with her own capital but, owing to the fact that her demand has been increasing, she decided to seek support through loans.  She says that the loans have helped her a lot because she has been expanding her grocery store this way for more than five years.

Mayra says that she has a high turnover of products in her grocery store and lately she has been running out.  She needs to stock her business so that she can satisfy demand from her loyal customers.  She is requesting a loan from Ceprodel to buy chicken, pork, rice, sugar, seasonings, soda, beans, sardines and Maggi soups.

loans.use: to buy chicken, pork, rice, sugar, seasonings, soda, beans, sardines and Maggi soups

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es una mujer de 52 años, se considera una persona de caracter fuerte, muy estricta y sobre todo responsable en su trabajo. Margarita es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive con su hermana en Machachi que se encuentra a 45 minutos de Latacunga.

Margarita trabaja con su hermana en la venta de fritada (carne de cerdo frita), acompañada de plátanos, tostado (maíz tostado). Es el segundo crédito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que invertirá en la compra de una cocina industrial debido a que la actual ya no garantiza un buen servicio, también comprará cerdos para la producción de fritada. Esta inversión ayudará a incrementar sus ventas y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus allegados.

Su sueño es poder tener un local propio y expandir mercado con sucursales.
texts.en:
Margarita is a 52-year-old woman.  She considers herself to be a strong-willed person, very strict and, above all, responsible in her work.  Margarita is single and doesn't have any children.  She lives with her sister in Machachi, 45 minutes from Latacunga.

Margarita works alongside her sister selling 'fritada' (fried pork), together with plantains and 'tostado' (toasted corn).  This is the second loan she has requested from Fodemi and she will invest it in buying an industrial stove because her current one is no longer reliable for providing a good service.  She will also buy pigs for producing 'fritada'.  This investment will help her to increase her sales and improve the quality of life of those closest to her.

Margarita's dream is to own her own premises and to expand her market with new branches.

loans.use: to buy an industrial stove and pigs so that she can improve her customer service and income

loans.name: Leli

texts.es: Leli, tiene la edad de 43 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, que son su mayor prioridad vive con su esposa y una hija, ya que los otros dos son mayores. Ella quiere comprar abono e insumos  para asistir su Cafetal que es su fuente de ingresos, en esta actividad trabaja con su esposo.  Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de  FUDECOSUR ya que le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. Ella  también tiene el deseo de brindarle a su Hija  la educación necesaria  para que sea en el futuro una persona preparada y pueda enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida
texts.en:
Leli is 43, married, and has three children who are her greatest priority. She lives with her husband and a daughter, as the other two are adults.  She wants to buy fertilizer and agricultural supplies to help her coffee plantation, which is her source of income. She works with her husband in this business. 

She has been working on her small farm for several years, and wants to expand. This is the first loan she has received from Fudecosur, as they offered her the loan on better terms, and at a much lower interest rate.  In addition, she wishes to offer her daughter the schooling she needs, so that someday she will be an educated person, and can face up to life more easily.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and agricultural supplies for growing coffee.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es: El señor José , es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su familia , él desde hace varios años labora para una empresa privada , pero por sus condiciones de vida económica , no le permite comprar de una sola vez materiales de construcción , para realizar una cocina , ya que donde su esposa hace el alimento de cada día es de fogón y  el humo de más de veinte cinco años a provocado problemas en sus pulmones , ya que para don Roberto es  de mucha importancia que se le apoye para poder priorizar la construcción  .A gradece la confianza y el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atravez de los fondo Kiva ya que sin estos programas de ayuda para las personas de bajos recursos no fuese posible hacerle realizad un sueño .
texts.en:
José lives in the town of Ticuantepe with his family.  For several years he has worked for a private company, but his financial situation does not allow him to buy all at once the construction materials to build a kitchen.  Where his wife makes the food every day is a campfire, and the smoke from more than 25 years has given her lung problems.  It is very important for Roberto to help her, to be able to prioritize the construction.

He is grateful for the trust and support that AFODENIC gives him through Kiva because it would not be possible for him to realize his dream without these programs to help low-income people.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Santa Lucia

texts.es:
La señora Santa Lucia es comerciante, tiene tres hijos de edad escolar, su esposo le envía la mercancía para la venta y así tener ingresos para su familia. Acaba de terminar de pagar su casa por lo que necesita escriturarlas para asegurar el patrimonio de sus hijos. Es por eso que solicita un préstamo y poder pagar las escrituras. 
Desea mejor la calidad de vida de su familia al tener un patrimonio propio y al mismo tempo brindarles un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Santa Lucia is a small business owner who has three school-age children. Her husband sends her the merchandise to sell, and in this way she earns income for her family. 

She has just finished paying for her house, so she needs to obtain the title deeds for it, in order to secure her children's inheritance. That is why she is applying for a loan to be able to pay for the title deeds. 

She wishes to improve her family's quality of life; by ensuring they have their own inheritance, and at the same time offering them a better future.

loans.use: To pay for the title deeds to her house.

loans.name: Richard Francisco

texts.es: El Joven Richard es soltero, tiene 25 años de edad, Richard estudia Administracion en un Instituto de prestigio, Richard escogió esta carrera ya que es su vocación y tiene las capacidades y habilidades para desarrollarse profesionalmente, actualmente trabaja en una empresa en el área de inventarios, Su sueño de Richard  es poner un negocio de tintoreria y a su vez brindarle a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida y de alguna forma devolverle a ellos todo lo que hicieron por él, con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para pagar sus practicas profesionales, Richard cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Richard is a young man of 25.  He is single.  Richard is pursuing a course in Management Studies in a prestigious institute.  He chose this course because it is his vocation and he has the capacity and ability to develop professionally.  He is currently working for a company doing stocktaking.  Richard's dream is to set up a dry cleaner's and provide his parents with a better quality of life.  He would like to somehow repay them for everything they have done for him.  In order to continue growing in his field, Richard has requested a new loan to cover his internship.  Richard will achieve his goals with a lot of hard work and effort.  Edaprospo's loans will help him.

loans.use: to cover his internship

loans.name: Benison

texts.en:
Benison is 42 years old and the father of four children.  He lives in Hioma, Uganda.  He owns a retail shop that he has been running for ten years.  He started it with less than a million shillings, but now he has over five million shillings in working capital.

He is hard working and trying to over come some of the challenges that he is facing, like price fluctuations and high taxes.  His family goals are to educate his children and build them a more permanent house.  Benison wants a loan so he can buy sugar and soap to sell.

loans.use: buy goods to sell in his store.

loans.name: Elizabeth De La Trinidad

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una mujer de 52 años de edad y vive con su familia en una comunidad de la zona Sur de Costa Rica, ubicada en Concepción de Pilas, en la provincia de Puntarenas. La economía local está basada en actividades agropecuarias, donde destaca la siembra de tubérculos, café, maíz, frijoles y ganadería.

Hace unos meses Elizabeth se dedica al cultivo de café, el cual tiene mucho auge en nuestro país y de este se hacen las mayores exportaciones a nivel mundial. Es por esta razón que  tiene la necesidad  de aumentar sus ingresos económicos, para de esta forma mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y darle a sus hijos la oportunidad de que reciban una buena educación.

Elizabeth está solicitando un préstamo de ₡1,000,000.00 (un millón de colones), para la compra de almacigo de café, lo cual son pequeñas plantas del mismo para lograr su objetivo, e;l cual es incrementar la cantidad de producción de café, conocido como “Grano de Oro” en nuestro país.

Elizabeth es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal en la Danta, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su primer préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico, además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 52 year-old woman who lives with her family in a community in Southern Costa Rica, located in Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas province. The local economy is based on agricultural outputs, particularly tubers, coffee, corn, beans, and cattle.

Elizabeth has been growing coffee for a few months now. Coffee has long been a major crop in Costa Rica, making it one of the largest global exporters.  Elizabeth needs to increase her income so that she can improve her family's quality of life and give her children the opportunity to receive a good education.

Elizabeth is requesting a loan of ₡1,000,000.00 (one million colones) to buy coffee seedlings, in order to help her achieve her goal: to increase her production of coffee, which is known as the "Golden Grain" in her country.

Elizabeth is a member of the Community Credit Company in La Danta, which is one of EDESA's 150 member organizations in Costa Rica. This will be her first loan and she hopes it will help her to continue growing on a personal and economic level. She also hopes to be an active participant in her community's credit organization.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings

loans.name: Reina De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Reina  es una mujer de 63 años de edad, vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada Upala que pertenece a la provincia de Alajuela, localidad que se caracteriza por sus parques nacionales, su extensa variedad en la flora y en la fauna y por tener un clima caliente, lo que permite la producción de ciertas frutas que se desarrollan con más  fuerza en este tipo de  clima, como el mango, el melón y otros propios de la zona.

Reina se dedica a la ganadería desde hace 30 años, con esta actividad han salido adelante ella y su familia, y le han podido hacer frente a los gastos diarios  de su hogar.

Actualmente Reina está solicitando un crédito por ¢500.000 para comprar dos vacas de ordeño, para  producir queso y  otros lácteos que posteriormente venderá a la  comunidad donde vive  y lugares  aledaños.

Reina  es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Colonia Puntarenas S.A, este será su tercer  préstamo,  razón por la cual está  muy agradecida por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Reina is 63 years old. She lives with her family in a community called Upala that belongs to the province of Alajuela. The area is known for its national parks, its extensive variety of plants and animals and for having a hot climate, which allows the production of certain fruits that grow better in this type of climate, such as mangos, melons, and others that do well in the area. 

Reina has been raising cattle for 30 years. With this business she and her family have been able to get ahead and they have been able to provide for the household’s daily expenses. 

Reina is requesting a loan of CRC 500,000 to buy two milk cows for producing cheese and other dairy products which she will sell in the community where she lives and also in nearby towns.

Reina is a member of Empresa de Crédito Colonia Puntarenas S.A. This is her third loan, which is why she is very grateful for the opportunities to access credit, which provide her the ablity to carry out her plans in life.

loans.use: to buy two milk cows.

loans.name: La Medalla Milagrosa Group

texts.es: Un grupo de mujeres con iniciativa, valores y buenas propuestas de cómo hacer negocio hoy en día, son las mujeres del grupo llamado La Medalla Milagroso,  conformado por 8 socias con interés de desarrollo por cada negocio. Este grupo comienza a dar marcha hace ya 8 años. La señora Norma, 57 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos ya todos mayores de edad, ella tiene un bodega la cual es su única fuente de ingresos hace más de ocho años y comenzó a raíz de que por su barrio no había una bodega, con el tiempo fue tomando mayor tamaño y espacio y haciéndose mas conocida, y es por eso que ella se siente muy agradecida con sus vecinos ya que la han apoyado a lo largo de tantos años. Con los ingresos de su bodega a podido implementar su casa y tener mayores comodidades y en el futuro le gustaría que su bodega crezca mucho más. Con el reciente préstamo lo invertirá en compras de polos para colegios.
texts.en:
This is a group of women with initiative, values and good proposals on how to conduct business nowadays. The group is called "La Medalla Milagrosa" (the miraculous medal) and consists of eight members, each interested in developing her business. The group was created eight years ago.

Señora Norma, aged 57, is married and the mother of four adult children. She has a grocery store, which has been her sole source of income for over eight years. She began this activity as a result of the lack of a grocery in her neighborhood. In the course of time she expanded her store and made it better known, and she is very grateful to her neighbors who supported her over all these years. With the income from her grocery she could install her home and enjoy more comfort, and in the future she would like to see her grocery expanding much more. Norma will use this loan to buy polo shirts for schools.

loans.use: to buy polo shirts.

loans.name: Carmen Carolina

texts.es: La señora Carmen es una persona responsable  y  muy  trabajadora   la  cual   se  dedica a la  venta de  ropa   usada  y de  esta  manera  apoya  a su apreciable  esposo para   salir  adelante  día  con día,  ella  esta  muy  contenta de  habernos  encontrado  ya  que   desea  que  la  apoyemos  en al realización de  su  proyecto, el cual consite  en  comprar   mercancía   para   vender, ya   que  nos  comenta   que  sus  clientes   le  piden   una  mayor  variedad   de esta,  ve  en el crédito la posibilidad  de  seguir   brindado a  sus  clientes  el excelente  servicio  que  la  a caracterizado,  además  de   que   generara   mayores  ingresos    los  cuales  le  permitirán  brindar  a  su  familia  una  excelente  estabilidad  económica.
texts.en: Carmen is a responsible and very hard-working person whose business is selling used clothing.  This is how she supports her dear husband in getting ahead in life day by day.  Carmen is very happy to have found us because she would like us to support her in buying merchandise to sell.  She tells us that her customers are requesting a wider variety of merchandise.  She sees a loan as a possibility to continue providing her customers with the excellent service that she is noted for.  It will also make her more income which will allow her to provide her family with very good financial stability.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Robert Melvin's Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are teachers of a secondary school in the city of Makeni, in northern Sierra Leone.  This group of teachers have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan.  With the help of this loan, these teachers can solve certain financial challenges that their salaries cannot solve.  At the end of each month, they will repay their SMT/Kiva loan using their monthly salaries.  Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for doing the repayment on their behalf.

Robert is the leader of this group of teachers.  A native of Yonibana village, the 58-year-old is married to the head teacher.  Robert is the father of nine children attending primary, secondary and tertiary institutions.  Robert has served in the teaching profession for 35 years.  He has requested this loan in order to buy house building materials, like rods, for the construction of a dwelling house.

loans.use: to buy materials for the construction of a house.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline, a 30-year-old woman from Homabay town, is married to Nashon, and they have three children ranging in age from 3 to 12 years. Caroline has operated a cereal stall business for the last 10 years, earning a monthly income of KES. 10,000.

Now requesting her second loan from KADET LTD to buy a stock of maize and bean cereals, she will use her profits to pay her children's school fees. Caroline's dream is to have both a good business and a good family.

loans.use: to buy maize and bean cereals.

loans.name: Carlos Adán

texts.es:
Carlos reside en el bello municipio de Catarina  departamento de Masaya, cuenta con 24 años de experiencia en la actividad de jardinería, trabajando con sus dos hijos que le ayudan a mantener las plantas frescas y limpias. 

Las ventas las realiza de contado a los turistas que visitan la zona y clientes fijos que visitan desde San Juan de Sur.    

El destino del crédito que solicita en Ceprodel es para la compra de plantas veraneras, clavellinas, coludos, mil flores, lirios, hortensias, araucarias pequeñas y grandes, cautos, palmeras robelianas, etc. 

Considera que esto le ayudará a elevar sus ventas al cubrir la demanda, y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos lives in the lovely municipality of Catarina in Masaya department. He has 24 years experience in the gardening business, working with his two sons, who help him to keep the plants fresh and clean. He does cash sales to the tourists who visit the area, and to established customers who visit from San Juan de Sur.  

The loan he is requesting from Ceprodel is earmarked for buying plants: bougainvilleas, carnations, coludos, milflores, lilies, hydrangeas, small and large araucaria pines, cautos, robelli palms, etc.  

He believes this will help him increase his sales by meeting the demand, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy bougainvilleas, carnations, coludos, milflores, lilies, hydrangeas, small and large araucaria pines, cautos, robelli palms, etc.

loans.name: Herlinda

texts.es: Herlinda  vive al sur de la ciudad  y se dedica al reciclaje; ella vende papel en un mercado  que conoce muy bien y que impulsan  su potencial de crecimiento. Herlinda compra desechos de papel en las empresas de la zona franca de la ciudad, los selecciona y los que están en buen estado los vende a diferentes clientes del sector y a almacenes de muebles y de vidrios que lo utilizan para envolver sus mercancías. Su meta mas adelante es lograr tener un local bien adecuado, para el desempeño efectivo de esta actividad;  su mayor desafío es el insuficiente capital de trabajo para hacer sus compras de oportunidad, con la cual ganaría muchos descuentos. Con su negocio ha logrado en compañía de su esposo generar bienestar para su hogar y tiene un gran empeño de aumentar sus ingresos,  haciéndolo crecer mediante su trabajo. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará  papel en mayor volumen y lo venderá el su mercado actual, el cual está esperando que responda a sus pedidos.
texts.en: Herlinda lives to the south of the city and works in recycling. She sells paper in a market that she knows very well and that drives her potential for growth. Herlinda buys waste paper from the businesses in the duty-free zone of the city. She selects them, and she sells those that are in good condition to various customers in the district and to furniture stores and glass stores, which use them to wrap their merchandise. Her goal for the future is to have a well-outfiitted shop where she can carry out this activity effectively. Her greatest challenge is insufficient working capital to make purchases when she has the opportunity and could get many discounts. With her business, she has managed, along with her husband, to create well-being in their household, and she has a great determination to increase her income, making it grow through her work. She is now applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy paper in large volume and sell it in the present market, which is waiting for her to respond to their orders.

loans.use: to buy paper in greater volume

loans.name: Rhodah's Group

texts.en:
